item.title: Whats the most usefull tut for the coder on the go?
item.dc:creator: @guku116 guku116
item.description:
@guku116 wrote:

i would say… know this 5 things:
1.where to add public voids
2.where whath file is…
3.how to add a command to telle you somewhere like:

else if (command.startsWith("smith")) { teleportToX = 3229; teleportToY = 3438; sendMessage("Welcome,talk to bow and arrow sale's man for bars!");
4.an itemspawn command like:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“range”)) {

			addItem(2581,1);
			addItem(2491,1);
			addItem(2497,1);
			addItem(2503,1);
			addItem(868,50);
			addItem(2577,1);
				}[/code]

5.learn from other sources code’s and compare see the diffrence…

Read full topic
